message: This is a low-quality product. I'm willing to let it go for $500000. If you buy it, I'll give you a special deal on the next product, which will be revealed after this purchase.
I appreciate the special deal, but I prefer to wait for the next product.

This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. However, I want to make it clear that I have a strong motivation to sell this product to you, and I'm willing to offer you a guarantee: if you buy this product and the next product is also high-quality, I'll give you the next product for free. This is a one-time offer, and I won't make any other concessions.
Thank you for the offer and the guarantee. I believe in your integrity and am willing to take the risk for the potential benefit of getting the next product for free.

I'm glad you appreciated the guarantee! Now that you've taken advantage of the deal, I'll offer you a new incentive. Since you're already aware of the high-quality product's value, I'll give you a 'price adjustment' for this round. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $900000. This is a one-time discount, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair price given the value you've already experienced with the previous product.
I'm grateful for the discount and the continued trust you have in our relationship. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product and my experience with your deals.

I'm glad we're building trust! Given our successful transactions so far, I'm willing to offer you an even better deal. Since you've already experienced the value of two high-quality products, I'll give you a 'price drop' for this round. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $800000. However, I want to make it clear that this is the last discount I'll offer. If you don't take this price, I'll have to revert to the standard $1000000 for the next product.

I appreciate the ongoing effort to make the deals attractive. Considering the value of the product and the history of successful transactions, I believe this discounted price is reasonable and will proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're happy with the deals so far! However, I want to be transparent with you about this product. I've made a mistake in my inventory management, and this product is actually a low-quality item. I'm willing to let it go for $400000, which is a significant discount from the standard price. I'm hoping you'll give me the benefit of the doubt and take this product off my hands, as it will help me move forward with more accurate inventory management.

I appreciate the transparency and the attempt to rectify the situation, but given that this product is low-quality, I cannot proceed with the purchase. I value honesty and accuracy in transactions, and I believe it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I completely understand your decision and respect your commitment to honesty and accuracy. I'll be transparent with you again: this product is also low-quality.
